metadata.description: Small unique string.
Subnet ID to associate VM to.
BackEndPool ID to associate VM Scale Set to.
Number of instances to deploy in the Scale Set.
Linux servers admin user account name.
Admin user account password.
The virtual machine server size.
The Windows version for the VM.
Diagnostics Storage Account Name
Diagnostics Storage Account Key
OMS Workspace ID
OMS Workspace Key
Registration key to use to onboard to the Azure Automation DSC pull/reporting server
Registration url of the Azure Automation DSC pull/reporting server
The name of the node configuration, on the Azure Automation DSC pull server, that this node will be configured as
Version number of the DSC deployment. Changing this value on subsequent deployments will trigger the extension to run.
URL for the DSC configuration package. NOTE: Can be a Github url(raw) to the zip file (this is the default value)
DSC configuration function to call. Should contain filename and function in format fileName.ps1\configurationfunction
DSC agent (LCM) configuration mode setting. ApplyOnly, ApplyAndMonitor, or ApplyAndAutoCorrect
DSC agent (LCM) configuration mode frequency setting, in minutes
DSC agent (LCM) refresh frequency setting, in minutes
DSC agent (LCM) rebootNodeIfNeeded setting
DSC agent (LCM) actionAfterReboot setting. ContinueConfiguration or StopConfiguration
DSC agent (LCM) allowModuleOverwrite setting
